en_second_half: box. Pain. But! Withdraw the hand and I’ll touch your neck with my gom jabbar—the death so swift it’s like the fall of the headsman’s axe. Withdraw your hand and the gom jabbar takes you. Understand?”
en_Completion: hour. It will start with a tingling, a numbness in your fingers. Then it will spread, a burning, a fire that will consume your hand, your arm, your entire body. You will scream, you will beg for mercy, but it will be too late. The pain will be all-consuming, and you will be mine."

en_Completion: is a baliset, a musical instrument, and these men are gathered here to discuss the matters of the day. en_first_half: “This is pretty far south into the desert,” he said. He lowered his binoculars, rubbed beneath his filter baffle, feeling how dry and
en_second_half: chapped his lips were, sensing the dusty taste of thirst in his mouth. “This has the feeling of a Fremen place,” he said.
en_Completion: chapped his lips were. He took a sip from his canteen, feeling the cool water soothe his parched throat. "We should be careful not to get too far from the last known water source," he cautioned, scanning the horizon for any sign of life or shelter. The endless dunes of sand stretched out before them, a seemingly endless sea of golden dust. "We don't want to get caught out here without a way to get back."</continuation

en_first_half: “Religion and law among our masses must be one and the same,” his father said. “An act of disobedience must be a sin and require religious penalties. This will have the
en_second_half: dual benefit of bringing both greater obedience and greater bravery. We must depend not so much on the bravery of individuals, you see, as upon the bravery of a whole population.”
en_Completion: effect of making the people more obedient to the law, as they will be afraid of committing a sin and facing religious penalties. This will also help to maintain social order and stability, as people will be less likely to engage in disobedient behavior if they believe it will have negative consequences for their spiritual well-being. Furthermore, by combining religion and law, the government can use religious institutions and leaders to promote obedience and compliance with the law, which can be an effective way to maintain control

vi_Completion: “tác động mạnh mẽ đến tâm hồn của dân chúng, khiến họ phải suy nghĩ kỹ lưỡng trước khi thực hiện bất kỳ hành động nào. Và như vậy, chúng ta sẽ có một xã hội ổn định và trật tự, nơi mà mọi người đều tuân thủ luật pháp và tôn giáo một cách nghiêm túc.”
es_first_half: —Religión y ley deben ser una única cosa para las masas —dijo su padre—. Un acto de desobediencia debe constituir un pecado sancionado por castigos religiosos. Esto tendrá
es_second_half: el doble beneficio de obtener una mayor obediencia y una mayor valentía. No debemos depender del valor individual, piénsalo bien, sino de la valentía de todo un pueblo.
es_Completion: que ser así, porque la autoridad de la religión es la única que puede mantener a las masas en su lugar. La religión es la base de la moralidad, y la moralidad es la base de la ley. Sin religión, no hay moralidad, y sin moralidad, no hay ley. Por lo tanto, es esencial que la religión y la ley sean una sola cosa para las masas.
